body:
Not sure when exactly this exception appeared, but I just removed some `flutter` deps to make `pubspec.yaml` pure `dart` only and then clicked on `Pub get`.

## Steps to Reproduce
probab this https://github.com/JetBrains/intellij-plugins/blob/master/Dart/src/com/jetbrains/lang/dart/ide/runner/server/DartConsoleFolding.java#L80

```java
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index 0 out of bounds for length 0

	at java.base/jdk.internal.util.Preconditions.outOfBoundsCheckIndex(Preconditions.java:70)
	at java.base/jdk.internal.util.Preconditions.checkIndex(Preconditions.java:248)
	at java.base/java.util.Objects.checkIndex(Objects.java:372)
	at java.base/java.util.ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:459)
	at com.jetbrains.lang.dart.ide.runner.server.DartConsoleFolding.getPlaceholderText(DartConsoleFolding.java:80)
	at com.intellij.execution.impl.ConsoleViewImpl.addFoldRegion(ConsoleViewImpl.java:1128)
	at com.intellij.execution.impl.ConsoleViewImpl.lambda$updateFoldings$16(ConsoleViewImpl.java:1107)
	at com.intellij.openapi.editor.impl.FoldingModelImpl.runBatchFoldingOperation(FoldingModelImpl.java:208)

	at com.intellij.execution.impl.ConsoleViewImpl.flushDeferredText(ConsoleViewImpl.java:731)
	at com.intellij.execution.impl.ConsoleViewImpl$FlushRunnable.doRun(ConsoleViewImpl.java:1616)
	at com.intellij.execution.impl.ConsoleViewImpl$FlushRunnable.run(ConsoleViewImpl.java:1612)
	at com.intellij.util.concurrency.QueueProcessor.runSafely(QueueProcessor.java:238)
	at com.intellij.util.Alarm$Request.runSafely(Alarm.java:369)
	at com.intellij.util.Alarm$Request.run(Alarm.java:356)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:515)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:264)
	at com.intellij.util.concurrency.SchedulingWrapper$MyScheduledFutureTask.run(SchedulingWrapper.java:220)

	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.FlushQueue.doRun(FlushQueue.java:84)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.FlushQueue.runNextEvent(FlushQueue.java:132)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.FlushQueue.flushNow(FlushQueue.java:47)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.FlushQueue$FlushNow.run(FlushQueue.java:188)
	at java.desktop/java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(InvocationEvent.java:313)
	at java.desktop/java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:776)
	at java.desktop/java.awt.EventQueue$4.run(EventQueue.java:727)
	at java.desktop/java.awt.EventQueue$4.run(EventQueue.java:721)
	at java.base/java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
```

## Version info

Dart plugin version: 202.8488

Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.19041.985]

comment_data.body: Sorry just noticed that Dart plugin has a separate issue repository, will report there.

title: Dart plugin: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index 0 out of bounds for length 0
